sqlMap.sql:
from p_syspara_sort where lang = #lang#
name like concat('%' , #name# , '%')
order by para_sort_id
sqlMap.select: select para_sort_id, name, p_sort_code, sort_desc, (select p.name as mc from p_code p where p.code_type = 'syzt' and p.lang=#lang# and p.value = effective_flag) as syzt
sqlMap.sql:
from p_syspara where lang = #lang#
para_sort_id = #para_sort_id#
para_sort_id = (select para_sort_id from (select para_sort_id from p_syspara_sort where lang = #lang# and name like concat('%' , #name# , '%') order by para_sort_id limit 0,1) c)
sqlMap.select: select para_id, para_sort_id, name, (select p.name as mc from p_code p where p.code_type = 'xtcszlx' and p.lang=#lang# and p.value = type_code) as type_code, default_value, max_limit, min_limit, (select p.name as mc from p_code p where p.code_type = 'syzt' and p.lang=#lang# and p.value = effective_flag) as syzt
select para_sort_id, p_sort_code, name,effective_flag as syzt, sort_desc from p_syspara_sort where para_sort_id = #para_sort_id#
select para_id, para_sort_id, name, type_code, default_value, max_limit, min_limit, effective_flag as syzt from p_syspara where para_id = #para_id#
sqlMap.update: update p_syspara_sort set name = #csflmc#, p_sort_code = #csflbm#, sort_desc = #csflms#, effective_flag = #syzt#, lang = #lang# where para_sort_id = #paraSortId#

update p_syspara set name = #csmc#, para_sort_id = #paraSortId#, type_code = #xtcszlx#, default_value = #csz#, max_limit = #cszsx#, min_limit = #cszxx#, effective_flag = #syzt#, lang = #lang# where para_id = #paraId#
sqlMap.insert:
select nextval('s_p_syspara_sort') from dual
